QA.Answer: Yes,  video has a 5-minute summary, that will be made available a little before the conference, but will also be streamed during the lightning talk sessions.
QA.Question: When will the paper videos be available?

QA.Answer: Each paper is associated with a \"poster\" session, during which the authors will be available for live video chat. Each paper also has a dedicated chat. Both of these are available from each paper's page.
QA.Question: How can I interact with the authors?

QA.Answer: Yes, we will be recording the talks, and will release the videos after the conference.
QA.Question: Will the videos be available later?

QA.Answer: No, we have left the format for the workshops to the organizers. However, there will be a chat associated with each workshop.
